ygData.subject: Re: ghoulbane
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a Sceenshot on EQ lizer, tkaen from the Everquest site of the Holy Flaming Avenger from the Beta Testing. That fire sword, supposedly the greatest
ygData.messageBody:
There is a Sceenshot on EQ'lizer, tkaen from the Everquest site of the Holy
Flaming Avenger from the Beta Testing. That fire sword, supposedly the
greatest weapon ever crafted, looks pretty cool!

-Dyce



> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rakim2001@... [SMTP:Rakim2001@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 4:09 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] ghoulbane
>
> From: Rakim2001@...
>
> Any chance that us lower level paladins could see a screenshot of what one
> of
> those holy swords look like while being wield? I am level 10 and I have
> never seen a paladin that was over level 25 or so.
>
> -Rojer paladin of the 10th circle and initiate of the BoB
